*Control Kritter - new version that works in multiplayer!
*
*On any controller...
*Press - to take control of home kritter
*Press + to take control of away kritter
*Press 2 to stop controlling kritters
*
*If a kritter is already being controller by another player, you won't be able to take control of him until that player stops controlling him 


CODE EXPLAINED:
48000000 8056a760   # Set po to 0x8056A760
de000000 00007fff   # Check if the halfword at po (halfword at 0x8056A760) is between 0x0000 and 0x7fff (it checks this because that's where the pointer to kritter's stats is usually loaded, and if it's not a value between 0x8000 and 0x8180 it means there is no match currently going on, and because of that it's a good time to reset the values of who's controlling kritter)
020001b4 00000000   # Halword write on 0x800001b4, an address of the Exception Vector Area where this code stores some variables
e0000000 80008000   # Final terminator, resets ba and po
28585ee2 00001000   # Check if - pressed by Controller 1
280001b4 00ff0000   # Check if the byte at 0x800001b4 is 0 (If it is then that means no one is currently controlling home kritter, but if it has some other value then it means someone is, so no one else can take control of it)
000001b4 00000001   # Set 0x800001b4 to 1 (take control of kritter)
e0000000 00000000   
28585ee2 00000100   # Check if 2 pressed by Controller 1
280001b4 00ff0100   # Check if the byte at 0x800001b4 is 1 (If it is then that means that the player with controller 1 is controlling it, so he's allowed to press 2 to stop controlling it)
000001b4 00000000   # Stop controlling kritter
e0000000 80008000
